channel.title: Portfolios on Alison Wilbur
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Alison Wilbur

item.title: Text Mining: Pitchfork Reviews
item.description: Used sentiment analysis, latent dirichlet allocation, cluster analysis, predictive modeling, and other text mining methodologies to understand the relationship between the content of an album review and the album’s ranking on Pitchfork.

item.title: Predictive Modeling: Classifying Alcoholic Status
item.description: Used random forest, gradient boosting, principal component analysis, logistic regression, and neural net models to select the best classification model to predict the Alcoholic Status of an individual based on their vital signs.

item.title: Digital Humanities: Combining Data Science with Qualitative Research
item.description: Used web scraping, classification models, and text mining, combined with qualitative research, in a web-based digital presentation (Wordpress website) that explores the societal implications of the emergence of the Hip Hop genre.

item.title: Statistical Consulting: Identifying Trends in High School Students' Perceptions of Drugs
item.description: Worked with real-world clients on a statistical consulting problem for UCLA statistics capstone course.

item.title: Netflix Streaming Interactive Dashboard
item.description: Designed interactive dashboard in Tableau using large dataset of all shows and movies available on Netflix in 2019.

item.title: Hulu Streaming Interactive Dashboard
item.description: Designed interactive dashboard in Tableau using large dataset of all shows available on Hulu.
